citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am to
11:45 am on 07-Mar-17.
The inspector waited for 30 minutes at the facility.
